[perl tables=global] return unless $Session->{arg}; delete $Scratch->{site_bounce}; $Scratch->{site} = $Session->{arg}; my $template = tag_data(qw/ global template /, $Scratch->{site}); $Scratch->{site_bounce} = "$template/home"; [/perl][bounce page="[scratch site_bounce]" if="[scratch site_bounce]"] SHOULD NOT SEE THIS!
